<script type="text/x-jquery-tmpl" id="CartDropdown_AjaxTemplate"> 
    <div class="item" id="${CartProductId}_CartDropdown_productItem">
        <div class="title-wide  ">
            ${Title}
            {{if Details2 != undefined && DetailsSub == undefined}}
                <br/>${Details2}
            {{/if}}            
            {{if Details != "" }}
                <div>
                    ${Details}
                    {{if DetailsSub != undefined}}
                        ${DetailsSub}
                    {{/if}}
                </div>
            {{/if}}
            {{if IsPassInsuranceApplicable}}
                {{if IsPassInsuranceAccepted}}
                    <input type="checkbox" id="${CartProductId}_chkPassInsurance_UpdateCartProduct" checked="checked" /> Pass Insurance (${PassInsuranceAmount})
                {{else}}
                    <input type="checkbox" id="${CartProductId}_chkPassInsurance_UpdateCartProduct" /> Pass Insurance (declined)
                {{/if}}
            {{/if}}
        </div>
        <div class=' 
             {{if !Promotion || !Promotion.DiscountAmount || Promotion.DiscountAmount * 1 == 0}}
                    price
                {{else}}
                    price discountedPrice
                {{/if}}
            '>
            <div class="remove"
                 data-sku="${OmnitureId}" 
                 data-price="${NumericPrice}"
                data-quantity="${Quantity}">
                <img src="/Content/component-themes/checkout/images/icon-delete.png" alt="X" />
            </div> 
            ${Price}       
        </div>
             
        {{if Promotion && Promotion.IsApplied }}        
            <div class="clearfix">
                <div class="promoCode">
                    Promo Code Applied: 
                    <span class="promoName">${Promotion.PromotionCode}</span>
                </div>    
                 {{if Promotion.DiscountAmount > 0 }}<span class="promoPrice">$${CurrencyFormatted(Promotion.AjustedPrice)}</span>{{/if}}         
            </div>
        {{/if}}

        <input type="hidden" id="${CartProductId}_CartDropdown_hdnCartProductId" value="${CartProductId}" />
    </div> 
</script>

<div class="main-header">
    <h1 class="page-title">Terrain & Lift Status</h1>

</div><div class="page-body">
    <br>
<br>
<h3>Updated throughout the day, below youll find the current status for all lifts and runs on the mountain.&nbsp; The Twitter feed (<a href="https://twitter.com/HVconditions" target="_blank">@HVConditions</a>) on the right will give you up-to-the-minute info from around the mountain.</h3>
<h3><span>For text updates throughout the day text the word HEAVENLY to 99-000.&nbsp; Youll receive daily info on lift operations, terrain, snow totals and parking. Youll always know what's going on here at Heavenly!</span></h3>
<p><span><br>
</span></p>
<h4>Lift status that is set as Open prior to 9:00 a.m. Mon-Fri and 8:30 a.m. Sat-Sun indicates which lifts are SCHEDULED to open for the day, weather permitting. Due to changing weather, scheduled lifts may change to Hold or Closed status upon opening.</h4>
<div><br>
<div><br>
</div>
</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div><br>
</div>
</div>
